originalText.text: Dr Sherman is very competent, caring and even called me when my husband passed away ( and it wasn’t a heart issue) . My husband suffered from Lewy Body Dementia.  I need to have another appointment in the next few weeks with Dr Sherman.

text.text: Dr Sherman is very competent, caring and even called me when my husband passed away ( and it wasn’t a heart issue) . My husband suffered from Lewy Body Dementia.  I need to have another appointment in the next few weeks with Dr Sherman.

originalText.text: Dr. Sherman is a very caring, compassionate and understanding doctor. The staff were very nice and very accommodating. I highly recommend, Dr. Sherman. I had a very pleasant experience with him and his staff.

text.text: Dr. Sherman is a very caring, compassionate and understanding doctor. The staff were very nice and very accommodating. I highly recommend, Dr. Sherman. I had a very pleasant experience with him and his staff.

originalText.text: Make sure you spare HOURS for your appointment! We scheduled an appointment two weeks in advance. Our appointment was at 12:15pm. We got there at 12nn, filled paperwork and submitted at 12:17pm. It was not a busy day and it was on a regular weekday. We waited for almost an hour in order to meet with the doctor. Receptionist was extremely rude with an attitude! She was not helpful and argued our appointment time started at 12:15pm so we didn't waited for an hour yet while I spoke with her at 1:00pm. If you expected patients to wait for almost an hour, what's the point of scheduling appointment?! The secretary asked us to pay the copay before we even meet with the doctor. It means all they care is to get the money in their pocket first. If not someone referred us to this doctor office we would have left. I wish the doctor office could hire more helpful and friendly staffs and better management with their scheduling. Stay away if you are someone who has a life and have other appointments!!!

originalText.text: Dr Sherman has been cordial, competent and a real friend; I'd recommend him to anyone.....
